item.description:
This lovely old-fashioned breakfast and lunch spot has a long counter and many individual tables. The dining space is charming and very well lit.

Hours: Monday – Friday 5am–7pm Saturday 5am-6pm Sunday 5am-2pm

Handicap Accessible: Entrance is level with the sidewalk.

Payments accepted: Cash, Debit Card, MasterCard, Visa

Products: Sandwiches, doughnuts, coffee

Food & dining options: Low calorie, Vegetarian

General services: Eat-in, Take-out

Specialties: Doughnuts

Parking: Free lot

Private events: No
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be sitting at the first table.
item.name: Get together at Whitney Donut & Sandwich Shop in Hamden
